summary: You can find public domain books in our book store.

messages.1: You can choose which of the available books you want to download.
messages.2: Doing so will install the book(s) onto your device, allowing you to play them and even add your own readers.

messages.1: You can also view which books you have already installed from our book store.
messages.2: From here, you can delete previously installed books or check for available updates.
